data.name: The Girl from Arkanya
data.detailed_description:
Become the world’s greatest treasure hunter!

The Girl from Arkanya is a retro-inspired, action-packed adventure game for those who know heroes don’t always work for free.



Join Marisa, a young treasure hunter trying to make a name for herself, as she ventures across the land of Amazonia searching for a lost priestess. Help her find fame and (more importantly) fortune, and claim the title of the world’s greatest treasure hunter!



But this job is too big for any one treasure hunter to do alone, so you’ll be joining forces with Kapi, a magical capybara! Work together with Kapi to defeat terrifying foes, solve ancient riddles, and navigate mysterious temples!



Every treasure hunter needs an arsenal of tools, and Marisa is no exception! Gather adventurer’s supplies and powerful artifacts, unlock bonus upgrades while learning about the citizens of Arkanya and Marajo, and seek out the blessings of the Amazonian priestesses! Each step along the way will help your odds of surviving the punishing trials ahead…


  • Retro-inspired, but never retro-limited.
  • A huge world brimming with secrets, and limitless treasures to collect.
  • Challenging, diverse, replayable dungeons that reward the player for returning with new equipment.
  • A rich and expansive story that combines history and mythology in exciting and intriguing ways.
  • Immersive worldbuilding that weaves together tales of knights, pirates, lizard men, and giant battle mechs.
  • Fearsome bosses with a lot of personality, who will make you laugh even as they grind you into the dirt.
  • An incredible soundtrack crossing many genres that will make you want to listen again and again!
  • Beautiful settings you’ll wish you could live in, like the prosperous port city of Arkanya, the ancient and mysterious temples of Marajo, or Puru Puru, the strange and reclusive kingdom of capybaras.

So, what do you say, mate? Want to come to Arkanya for an adventure?

data.short_description: The Girl from Arkanya is a top-down treasure hunting RPG, mimicking the style and feel of 2D Zelda games. Explore the jungles of Amazonia as Marisa, alongside her capybara companion!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Celeron G1820 / AMD Athlon II X3 455
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Quad Core 3.0Ghz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Snow Leopard 10.6.8, 32/64-bit
  • Processor: Processor Good
  • Graphics: OpenGL 4.1 compatible graphics card
